ygData.subject: Sirynn Hair Hood and cha items
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry for all the newbe question. This item adds +13 cha and a few other things. I know its off a rare npc in Rathe Mountains. What is it s name and what level
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry for all the newbe question. This item adds +13 cha and a few other
things. I know its off a rare npc in Rathe Mountains. What is it's name and
what level is it? Any one have a clue? I am looking for items that will
boots my cha befor I get too heavy into jewling. I dont know if this was
posted but here is a few item I found that can be quested for, and the
spoliers. If you have any other info on items that boots cha pleas I am very
intrested.




Rod of Insidious Glamour: (increases charisma) He needs a golden rod (from a
froglok priest in guk) and an enchanted shining stone. The enchanted shining
stone is made from a shining stone from shadow men, take that stone to
Cynthia, a gypsie in the rathe mountains and give it and 50gp to get it
enchanted. Then go to Highkeep and get the stone transmuted. The two steps
for getting the stone each raise faction with beta neutral and can be done
separately from the rest of the quest for those who just need a faction
boost

1 hand blunt delay : 30 Damage :6 Ac :2 +10 cha Effect: Alliance

Incandescent Gloves: He needs to sew together four other sets of gloves to
make these. Glowing Gloves from Shadowed Men, Radiant Gloves from Radiant in
the mazes of Cazic Thule and Enchanted and Gleaming gloves. For Gleaming
Gloves you have to give Tarn Vislin in Highkeep a bloodstone he will then
give you Gleaming gloves. Bring 50gp to Tizina of the Lavastorm Gypsies. She
will then hand you the Enchanted Gloves.

AC :6 Cha, Str, Agi, Mana +3

Incandescent Mask: He needs a Glowing Mask, found on the skeletal monk in
the caverns of Guk (I have also been told you can get one on the froglock
scryer) and all three Runes of Fortune. One Rune can be found on the Dark
Elf Enynti in the Chasm below Castle Mistmoore. The other two can each be
purchased for 50 golden coins each - one from Mizr N`Mar in the Neriak City
Library and the other from Madam Serena in Qeynos.

AC 3, +5 Int,+7 Cha, Mk
